about_the_game:
You are a Remonstrator. The freedom of this world depends on you.

  • Fights with crowds of police

  • ...Side by side with a crowd of the same people dissatisfied with the system

  • Realistic combat system in the Beat'Em Up genre with police batons

  • Unrealistic ragdoll physics of enemies flying away from your menace

  • Extremely realistic physics of desecration of city streets with impurities

  • Locations taken from real places and events... well, or not quite

  • Ranks and style points

  • Soundtrack based on popular songs

Russian revolution

Moscow, Bolotnaya Square, 2011: a crowd of aggressively-minded Muscovites rebelled against the regime. Take part in a mass brawl with the police and defeat the commander of the defense detachment with the call sign "Bryansk-North"!

Battle for the Capitol

Washington, Capitol, 2020: Americans dissatisfied with the government have laid siege to the main government building. Break through the police fortifications and defeat Lieutenant Covfefe to get to the heart of the country!

Farmer's Fury

Europe, 2020s: cornered by harsh laws, farmers are wreaking havoc on the city streets, armed with their tractors and manure delivery systems. Show the legislators what their restrictions are worth!
detailed_description:
You are a Remonstrator. The freedom of this world depends on you.

  • Fights with crowds of police

  • ...Side by side with a crowd of the same people dissatisfied with the system

  • Realistic combat system in the Beat'Em Up genre with police batons

  • Unrealistic ragdoll physics of enemies flying away from your menace

  • Extremely realistic physics of desecration of city streets with impurities

  • Locations taken from real places and events... well, or not quite

  • Ranks and style points

  • Soundtrack based on popular songs

Russian revolution

Moscow, Bolotnaya Square, 2011: a crowd of aggressively-minded Muscovites rebelled against the regime. Take part in a mass brawl with the police and defeat the commander of the defense detachment with the call sign "Bryansk-North"!

Europe, 2020s: cornered by harsh laws, farmers are wreaking havoc on the city streets, armed with their tractors and manure delivery systems. Show the legislators what their restrictions are worth!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux with kernel 6.5+
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 5700 XT or newer
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Remonstrator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The world has gone mad and lost every bit of justice. Take a part in well-known historical events against the police and unleash your protest!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
